title: Reactions to the Tyreek Hill Trade and Teams That Helped Themselves the Most
description:
Kevin, Nora, and Steven react to the news of Tyreek Hill being traded from the Chiefs to the Dolphins and what that means for both teams. Then they discuss the teams that did and did not help themselves during the free agency period.

Host: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
